entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers or flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy. Rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 then becoming south 70 gusting to 100 near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
